file_content.text: On behalf of the Ministry of War, I hope your mercenary serves you well. Good day.
A pleasure to greet you, my lord.
Greetings, hunter. Your name and reputation are known even to me.
Identiscan complete. Approved for maximum discretion. All records of this meeting will be deleted.
Greetings. The Empire proudly recognizes you for your efforts on its behalf.
I am MQ-12, liaison to the Ministry of War's mercenary recruitment division. I find appropriate employment for talented freelance soldiers serving the Empire.
Would you be interested in acquiring a combatant who achieved a perfect score on the Mekhis Aggression Index?
Uncontrolled rage is useless to me. My servants must follow my orders without fail.
Obedience trumps aggression.
I predict you will be pleased by this one's eagerness for direction, my lord.
Perfect aggression represents a danger to master and servant alike. Luckily, I have some experience keeping my beasts in line.
It had better accept my leash.
This particular individual reserves its aggression exclusively for enemies. You'll find it quite obedient, my lord.
I've fried plenty of angry idiots who couldn't shoot straight. Does the merc have anything to back up that hostility?
Aggression is overrated.
I believe this individual can provide a substantial intimidation factor, in spite of its physical shortcomings.
The problem with soldiers for hire is that they're always open to better offers.
Mercenaries can be unreliable.
As you say, but this particular individual demonstrates remarkable commitment to honoring its contracts.
I've never heard of this Aggression Index before. Explain it.
Tell me what that score means.
The test measures an individual's psychological predisposition toward violence and effectiveness at channeling hostility during combat encounters. Perfect scores are exceedingly rare.
Disposable mercenaries are the best kind. There's a good chance you'll never have to pay them.
Yes. The crazier, the better.
I would hold credits in reserve, just to be safe. Based on its service record, this individual demonstrates remarkable resiliency.
The Science Bureau has classified this mercenary as a hopelessly primitive creature from an undeveloped Outer Rim system, but judged it as useful nonetheless.
It has served Imperial interests on Balmorra and Taris. Most recently, it proved invaluable to operations on Corellia by assassinating over fifteen enemy commanders.
Mercenaries exaggerate their accomplishments, but if that number is anywhere near accurate, I'd say this is someone I should meet.
That's impressive, if true.
By all accounts, the mercenary was frequently mistaken for a misshapen Drall. By the time our foes realized their error, it was too late.
It has previously served Imperial interests on Nar Shaddaa and displayed noteworthy commitment to our cause by eliminating a dozen resistance groups on Balmorra.
Either this mercenary is good, or Balmorra's resistance fighters are inept. Which is it?
That's impressive, I suppose.
Perhaps both. As you will see, the individual's physical qualities can camouflage its intentions.
I wouldn't expect that kind of enthusiasm and devotion from a mercenary.
What drives this loyalty?
The Science Bureau performed a thorough psychological examination before releasing it. The subject rated highly for obedience, ambition and excessive pride in its accomplishments.
Don't expect me to be impressed. Compared to me, this mercenary is an amateur.
I've killed far more.
Perhaps--but an extremely promising one nevertheless. Keep an open mind, and you may be surprised.
Judge for yourself. It understands our language well enough, and will respond in its own crude fashion. The subject calls itself "Treek."
The Emperor's Wrath--greatest Sith in all the stars endless. Slayer of foes many, I salute your power!
Your previous employers trained you well. But there's more to serving me than showing respect. In battle, I'll require everything you have to give.
We're off to a good start.
I possess talents and skills many. Ask, and I will give all!
I am honored. You are a mighty Sith, slayer of foes many. You have potential to rule stars and achieve victories endless!
Your attitude pleases me--but what will you do to fulfill that vision of my future?
You could serve me well.
You have an obstacle? I will remove it. You have an ally? I will protect it. You have an enemy? I will kill it.
You are Darth of the Dark Council, vanquisher of foes many, wielder of powers endless! This is a great honor, mighty Sith!
Your intelligence far exceeds your stature. How could I ever refuse the service of such an ardent admirer?
How nice of you to notice.
I am fated to serve your will. Set a challenge before me. I will conquer it.
You are the Sith who rose from slavery to challenge the mighty. You will destroy foes many and achieve victories endless! You honor me.
Listening to you is like hearing my own internal monologue. I like it.
That's exactly what I think.
This meeting is fate. Today, I will join you in conquering destiny.
You're eager to serve. Do you know what it means to bind your fate to a Sith Lord?
And what do you know of Sith?
Sith are the Empire's greatest warriors. Where you go, victory follows. Is there more to know? I will learn it!
They say you are the greatest hunter in the galaxy. You have seized victories many, and vanquished foes endless. I salute you!
You're friendlier than I expected. Guess I should give you a chance to prove yourself.
It's nice to meet a fan.
I seek tests and trials many. Give them to me. You will be pleased!
They say you have defeated foes many, hunter. You are respected and feared. I am the same. We will achieve victories endless!
One thing's for sure: Inside that furry little body, you've got the heart of a fighter.
I admire your spirit.
Yes! I was the greatest warrior of my homeworld. Now I seek greater glory.
No offense, but most mercenaries I've met aren't quite so... round, short and furry.
How do you survive?
They are all advantages. I am insulated, hard to hit and camouflaged. Secrets of my success.
I hear your name whispered in fear. They say you are a shadow who has killed foes many. I bow to your victories endless!
That's most generous of you. I'm surprised you've heard so much about me. I work hard to suppress my reputation.
You're kind, but keep it down.
A quiet hunter who stalks unseen? That is a good policy. I respect it.
You are top Imperial intelligence operative. Best of the best! Potential for victories many and glories endless. I salute you!
I haven't had the pleasure of encountering anyone like you before. This droid tells me you're quite talented in battle.
It's good to meet you.
Yes! I have skills and edges many. I place them all at your service.
A deadly assassin disguised as a household pet. No wonder you've managed to kill so many.
Now I understand your success.
Fools many underestimate me, and do not live to regret their mistake.
I'm not sure what's worse, your appearance or that stupid babble you call speaking.
You're ridiculous.
You test me with hateful words, but I pass your trial without failure. Now you can hire me without doubts.
You are a hero of the Empire. Foes many fear your coming. I predict victories endless in your future! I am honored to serve.
Hello.
This meeting is fated. I will waste no more time on others. I will join you.
This must be a joke.
You doubt me? I searched long to find a great warrior worthy of my skills. That is you.
You're pathetic.
You seek to anger me with hateful words? I stand strong and loyal. I save my anger for your enemies.
I offer you my strong arms and clear eyes. I fight for your cause and do not fail. You provide epic battles. Together, we become legends. You agree?
Welcome to my crew, Treek. Your contract with me begins immediately. Ready?
Yes, I think you're useful.
I was born for this moment. We go!
If you're satisfied with glory, I'll pay well. If it's credits you want, I keep whatever I find.
Don't expect to get rich.
You negotiate fairly. I will take anything you do not.
You do exactly what I say from now on. Disobey me even one time, and I'll cancel your contract permanently.
Obey me, or die.
I do not fail now or later. You will see.
You are now my chief. I wait for your order. Show me your enemies, and I will show them death.
You are now my chief. I will go claim my place on your starship and wait for orders.
I am pleased you found my offering worthwhile, my lord. I will report our success to the Ministry of War. Good day.
I am glad you found this transaction worth your time. The Ministry of War thanks you. Good day.
Greetings. I am MQ-12, serving the Imperial Ministry of War.
